src.file.level
Class LevelHeader

java.lang.Object
  src.file.level.LevelHeader

public class LevelHeader
extends java.lang.Object

A class to store all Level-related data in a header.

Author:
Jonathan Irons date 2/6/2008

Accessor for number of rows in Level.

Mutator for both dimensions.

Parameters:
rows - int : Change number of rows (measured in Land units).
cols - int : Change number of columns.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Accessor for Level name.

Returns:
String : Level name, as represented by a String.

setName

public void setName(char[] n)
Mutator for Level name.

Parameters:
n - char[] : Change level name to an array of chars, n. Anything longer than MAXIMUM_NAME_LENGTH will be truncated.
See Also:
MAXIMUM_NAME_LENGTH

setName

public void setName(java.lang.String s)
Mutator for Level name.

Parameters:
s - String : Change level name to a String, s. Anything longer than MAXIMUM_NAME_LENGTH will be truncated.
See Also:
MAXIMUM_NAME_LENGTH

nameToByte

public byte[] nameToByte()
Converts the Level's name from chars into bytes.

Returns:
byte[] : The byte array resulting from the conversion of the name's char array.

Writes the LevelHeader to a file.
